channel.title: Comments on: The Most Awkward 404 Not Found Page on the Internet

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/07/12/the-most-awkward-404-not-found-page-on-the-internet/#comment-3775">Steve Lambert</a>.
I've disabled Flash in my primary browser (Chrome), so having this work without Flash is the only way I would have paid any attention to it :-)
Seriously though, it is 2011, how much further into the future do we have to go before Flash is no longer a requirement for video on the web?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Steve Lambert.

I’ve disabled Flash in my primary browser (Chrome), so having this work without Flash is the only way I would have paid any attention to it ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Steve Lambert
item.dc:creator: Steve Lambert
item.description: Thanks for noticing the no-flash part!
